column4: hey im running a dual boot right now, and i want to get rid of my other OS and have just ubuntu, is that possible?
how do i get rid of it
do you have Partition Editor in System -> Administration?
use Applications -> Add/Remove to find and install Gnome Partition Editor
Partition Editor should now be listed in System -> Administration
now i can restore my partition?
its not windows xp its linux xp
oh, I'm afraid I have no idea what linux xp is.
are you running linux xp right now, or are you running ubuntu?
